transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good morning Pawan bhai, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Bas bas badhiya aap batao kaise ho?
Executive: Main bahut badhiya aur kaisa chal raha hai business vagaira?
Customer: Haan abhi theek thak.
Executive: Abhi sahi chal raha hai matlab theek thak sa chal raha hai. Pehle mein aur abhi mein koi difference vagaira aaya?
Customer: Nahi abhi difference vahi hai ke kya hai ke jaise wo inquiries close vagaira mein jaise wo reach ho rahi thi na matlab abhi ek week se to aisa lag raha hai kuch ho hi nahi raha hai aisa. Matlab bahut kam visiting ho rahi hai abhi. Catalog views wo jo hum bol rahe hain na jaise humne kuch thoda bahut changes kara to uski vajah se aisa lag raha hai mujhe.
Executive: Nahi aa to rahi hai leads vagaira ka to aa raha hai maine check bhi kiya tha.
Customer: Aa raha hai ye jaise ki catalog views clients vagaira apna to dekho mera to ye 24 hours to nahi bol sakte par main always morning hota rahu. Hmm. Theek hai IndiaMART mera connected hi rehta hai. Hmm. To vaisa to hota nahi ki IndiaMART koi bhi inquiries vagaira bhi koi catalog vagaira bhi kuch dekh raha hai to main turant hi dekh hi leta hu.
Executive: Direct inquiry wale mein agar main baat karu to abhi November mein aath inquiry generate hui hai. Theek hai.
Executive: Last month mein apne paas mein 50 generate hui thi. Theek hai usse pehle 68 hui thi. Theek hai to abhi ye to khair aaj to matlab 7 tarikh hi hai. To abhi ye dheere dheere karke badh jayega isme koi aisi dikkat nahi hai. Buylead hai but buylead ka consumption to November mein buylead to aapne achi khasi purchase kar li hai. Theek hai wo bhi consume kar rahe ho kafi acche se aur catalog views mein bhi November mein abhi tak aapke paas panch catalog views aaye. Matlab panch catalog views ho gaye aur aath direct inquiry ho gayi to aath panch 13 ke aas paas aaya hai aapke paas mein. Theek hai. Aur har month on month agar mano na to catalog views aapka jaise October mein October mein aapke paas kareeb 62 ke aas paas aaya hua tha. Theek hai abhi jo hai wo panch hai to abhi ye thoda sa improve bhi ho jayega to isme dikkat itni jyada rahegi nahi. Kyunki abhi naya abhi month start hua hai na aapko bhi pata hai dekho ki month start hota hai to cheeze alag hi hoti hai. Fir dheere dheere karke cheeze change hoti jati hai. To usme improvement to ho jayegi koi aisi dikkat nahi hai. Consumption bhi aapka sahi chal raha hai consumption to idhar to kafi accha kiya aapne. 92% consumption kiya hai 0 to 4 hours ke andar mein. Kuch badi lead bhi aa rahi hai unko purchase kar paye the jaise ek 21 minute pehle ki aayi thi LED flood light ki 220 DC ki 100 pieces ki ek 40 pe ek 90 tak ka order value tha ye consume kar paye the aaj.
Customer: Nahi aaj nahi wo kar paye raha tha kyunki pata nahi jaise main consume karne ja raha tha to matlab expiry ho ja rahi thi.
Executive: Sold out ho rahi hogi na kyunki client bahut jyada hai client base bahut hai flood light ke andar mein to is vajah se kyunki aur consume bhi second ke andar ho rahi thi. Ha ha second ke andar hogi sir ek second do second mein bhi buylead consume ho jati hai. Bahut teji mein consume hoti hai kyunki log bahut jyada hai flood light ke andar mein log hi sab kitne jyada hai na. Asal mein consumption hota kya hai sir ki panch hi log consume kar sakte hain. Theek hai panch se jyada to consume kar nahi payenge koi bhi lead aa rahi hai tab bhi aap ye maan karke chalo last six month mein aapne 917 buylead consume kari hai LED flood light ki kafi acchi buylead consume hui hai. Theek hai abhi chalo khair koi dikkat nahi hai abhi thoda sa aur improve kar lenge aap matlab jitna jyada aur active ho jayenge seller panel pe to aapko lead bhi waha milne lagegi consume karne ke liye koi dikkat hogi nahi aisi. Theek hai wo bhi cheeze improve ho jayengi thoda sa aur dekh leta hu ki kya isme puch sakte hain kaise kya kar sakte hain. Theek hai ye cheeze kar lete hain. Main actually call isliye kiya tha kal mere jo baat hui thi baat unka actually phone aaya tha mere paas mein to ek pehle unhone call kiya to wo ek ring mein hi call cut gayi apne aap disconnect ho gayi thi. To maine unko palat ke call kiya tha. nahi dekha wo turant hi cut ho gayi thi mere ko to idea hi nahi hai mere ko pata nahi kya ho raha hai. Call cut hi ho gayi matlab network ka kuch issue tha to wo turant hi disconnect ho gaya tha. Theek hai. Yes yes yes. Haan. To ye wali cheez hai uski vajah se ab ab maine turant hi palat ke call bhi kar liya tha unko to mera baat bhi ho gaya tha unse abhi maine call kiya tha to call uthaye nahi the but hota kya hai ki agar ek ring bhi karti hai na to wo hamare yaha pe concern open kar deta hai ki client ne call kiya tha aap connect kar lo to meri already unse discussion ho hi gaya hai is vajah se maine abhi turant kiya tha close. Theek hai. ho chuka hai to aap waha pe jo primary mail hai na aapki kaunsi chalti hai ye wali aapke paas mein access rehta hai P se start hai kya hai mere ko yaad bhi nahi hai puri. Maine aaj mere ko maine do mail subah dekhe the ek wo ticket generate wala kuch kiya hua tha. Haan haan haan vahi wala vahi vahi vahi nahi nahi wo to main vahi jo miss call bata raha hai na usi se hi wo ticket generate hua tha usi ka hi mail aaya hoga aapke paas mein. Kya haan mere paas do mail aaye the actually. Aapke paas aaya hoga usme ticket ID dikha raha hoga main bata de raha hu 9 9644893 yahi aaya hoga na? Yes. Haan ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Decrease in visiting and catalog views.

- Unable to consume leads due to expiry.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed leads are being generated.

- Explained reasons for lead expiry.

- Provided details of catalog views and direct inquiries.

- Explained about consumption of buyleads.

- Provided ticket ID for the missed call issue.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog views, lead consumption, ticket id
